message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
Alice, my turn. I believe this offer is more beneficial to both of us in the long run.  What do you say?
Bob, time is running out. This is a good deal for you, take it while you can.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  This offer is fair and avoids further losses due to inflation. It's time to settle.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share even more!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair offer. Let's end this now before we both lose more.
